blocks.name: cycsubggend
blocks.content: The cyclic subgroup generated by ` A ` includes its generator. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm cycsubggend(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, crn(c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c3))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(cmg, c3))
  -| wceq(c1, cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c4, c0)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  rr-elrnmptd(s0, c0, c1, cz, co(cv(s0), c4, c0), nat1, c2, w0)
  1zzd(w0)
  eqtr2d(c0, co(cv(s0), c4, c0), co(nat1, c4, c0), wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))
  oveq1d(cv(s0), c4, c0, nat1, wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), nat1)))
  simpr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), nat1))
  syl(wa(w0, wceq(cv(s0), nat1)), wceq(co(nat1, c4, c0), c0), wcel(c0, c2))
  adantr(w0, wceq(cv(s0), nat1), wcel(c0, c2))
  mulg1(c0, c2, c4, c3)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cycsubggend(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ ran(c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c3)
  ⊣ c4 =(.g ` c3)
  ⊣ c1 =(s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c4]c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  rr-elrnmptd(s0, c0, c1, cz, (s0[c4]c0), nat1, c2, w0)
  1zzd(w0)
  eqtr2d(c0, (s0[c4]c0), (1[c4]c0), (w0 ∧ s0 = 1))
  oveq1d(s0, c4, c0, nat1, (w0 ∧ s0 = 1))
  simpr(w0, s0 = 1)
  syl((w0 ∧ s0 = 1), (1[c4]c0)= c0, c0 ∈ c2)
  adantr(w0, s0 = 1, c0 ∈ c2)
  mulg1(c0, c2, c4, c3)
  diff.cz.s(s0)
  diff.nat1.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: cycsubgcld
blocks.content: The cyclic subgroup generated by ` A ` is a subgroup. Deduction related to ~ cycsubgcl . (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm cycsubgcld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(crn(c0), cfv(csubg, c1)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmg, c1))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c3, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, cgrp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  simpld(w0, wcel(crn(c0), cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c4, crn(c0)))
  syl2anc(w0, wa(wcel(crn(c0), cfv(csubg, c1)), wcel(c4, crn(c0))), wcel(c1, cgrp), wcel(c4, c2))
  cycsubgcl(s0, c1, c4, c2, c0, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cycsubgcld(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ran(c0)∈(SubGrp ` c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ c3 =(.g ` c1)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c3]c4))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Grp)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
} = {
  simpld(w0, ran(c0)∈(SubGrp ` c1), c4 ∈ ran(c0))
  syl2anc(w0, (ran(c0)∈(SubGrp ` c1)∧ c4 ∈ ran(c0)), c1 ∈ Grp, c4 ∈ c2)
  cycsubgcl(s0, c1, c4, c2, c0, c3)
}

blocks.name: ablsimpnosubgd
blocks.content: A subgroup of an abelian simple group containing a nonidentity element is the whole group. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablsimpnosubgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(c0g, c2))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, csimpg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cfv(csubg, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wceq(c4, c3)))
} = {
  mpjaod(w0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, csn(c3)), wceq(c0, c1))
  pm2.21d(w0, wceq(c0, csn(c3)), wceq(c0, c1))
  mtod(w0, wceq(c0, csn(c3)), wcel(c4, csn(c3)))
  nsyl(w0, wcel(c4, csn(c3)), wceq(c4, c3))
  elsni(c4, c3)
  syl5ibcom(w0, wceq(c0, csn(c3)), wcel(c4, csn(c3)), wcel(c4, c0))
  eleq2(c0, csn(c3), c4)
  idd(w0, wceq(c0, c1))
  simpgnsgeqd(c0, c3, c1, c2, w0)
  eleqtrd(c0, cfv(cnsg, c2), cfv(csubg, c2), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(cfv(csubg, c2), cfv(cnsg, c2)), wcel(c2, cabl))
  eqcomd(cfv(csubg, c2), cfv(cnsg, c2), wcel(c2, cabl))
  ablnsg(c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablsimpnosubgd(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 = c1)
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(0 ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ SimpGrp)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(SubGrp ` c2))
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c4 = c3)
} = {
  mpjaod(w0, c0 = c1, c0 = { c3 }, c0 = c1)
  pm2.21d(w0, c0 = { c3 }, c0 = c1)
  mtod(w0, c0 = { c3 }, c4 ∈ { c3 })
  nsyl(w0, c4 ∈ { c3 }, c4 = c3)
  elsni(c4, c3)
  syl5ibcom(w0, c0 = { c3 }, c4 ∈ { c3 }, c4 ∈ c0)
  eleq2(c0, { c3 }, c4)
  idd(w0, c0 = c1)
  simpgnsgeqd(c0, c3, c1, c2, w0)
  eleqtrd(c0, (NrmSGrp ` c2), (SubGrp ` c2), w0)
  syl(w0, (SubGrp ` c2)=(NrmSGrp ` c2), c2 ∈ Abel)
  eqcomd((SubGrp ` c2), (NrmSGrp ` c2), c2 ∈ Abel)
  ablnsg(c2)
}

blocks.name: ablsimpg1gend
blocks.content: An abelian simple group is generated by any non-identity element. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablsimpg1gend(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cz, wceq(c0, co(cv(s0), c1, c2))))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c5, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmg, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, csimpg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wceq(c2, c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  rr-elrnmpt2d(s0, cz, c0, co(cv(s0), c1, c2), cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c1, c2)), w0)
  eleqtrrd(c0, crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c1, c2))), c3, w0)
  ablsimpnosubgd(crn(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c1, c2))), c3, c4, c5, c2, w0)
  cycsubgcld(s0, cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c1, c2)), c4, c3, c1, c2, w0)
  simpggrpd(c4, w0)
  cycsubggend(s0, c2, cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c1, c2)), c3, c4, c1, w0)
  eqid(cmpt(s0, cz, co(cv(s0), c1, c2)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablsimpg1gend(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → ∃(s0 ∈ ℤ, c0 =(s0[c1]c2)))
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c4)
  ⊣ c5 =(0 ` c4)
  ⊣ c1 =(.g ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ SimpGrp)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c2 = c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  rr-elrnmpt2d(s0, cz, c0, (s0[c1]c2), (s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c1]c2)), w0)
  eleqtrrd(c0, ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c1]c2))), c3, w0)
  ablsimpnosubgd(ran((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c1]c2))), c3, c4, c5, c2, w0)
  cycsubgcld(s0, (s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c1]c2)), c4, c3, c1, c2, w0)
  simpggrpd(c4, w0)
  cycsubggend(s0, c2, (s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c1]c2)), c3, c4, c1, w0)
  eqid((s0 ∈ ℤ ↦(s0[c1]c2)))
}

blocks.name: ablsimpgcygd
blocks.content: An abelian simple group is cyclic. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablsimpgcygd(class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, ccyg))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg))
} = {
  rexlimddvcbv(hs1, hs0, cfv(cbs, c0), w0, wcel(c0, ccyg), wn(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c0g, c0))), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  simpgnideld(hs1, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(c0g, c0), c0, w0)
  iscygd(hs1, hs2, c0, cfv(cbs, c0), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs0), wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))))))
  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0)))), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  simpggrpd(c0, w0)
  simprl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  ablsimpg1gend(hs2, cv(hs1), cfv(cmg, c0), cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0), c0, cfv(c0g, c0), wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))))
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c0))
  eqid(cfv(c0g, c0))
  eqid(cfv(cmg, c0))
  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c0, cabl))
  ad2antrr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0)))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)), wcel(c0, csimpg))
  simplrl(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  simplrr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  simpr(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0)))
  notbid(wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c0g, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0)))
  eqeq1(cv(hs1), cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs1.w(wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, ccyg))
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wceq(cv(hs1), cfv(c0g, c0))))
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(c0g, c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(cfv(cmg, c0))
  diff.hs1.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cbs, c0))
  diff.hs2.c(cfv(cmg, c0))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs0))
  diff.hs1.w(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))))))
  diff.hs2.c(cv(hs1))
  diff.hs2.w(wa(wa(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c0)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cfv(c0g, c0))))), wcel(cv(hs1), cfv(cbs, c0))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablsimpgcygd(class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈ CycGrp)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ SimpGrp)
} = {
  rexlimddvcbv(hs1, hs0, (Base ` c0), w0, c0 ∈ CycGrp, ¬ hs1 =(0 ` c0), ¬ hs0 =(0 ` c0))
  simpgnideld(hs1, (Base ` c0), (0 ` c0), c0, w0)
  iscygd(hs1, hs2, c0, (Base ` c0), (.g ` c0), hs0, (w0 ∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ ¬ hs0 =(0 ` c0))))
  adantr(w0, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ ¬ hs0 =(0 ` c0)), c0 ∈ Grp)
  simpggrpd(c0, w0)
  simprl(w0, hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), ¬ hs0 =(0 ` c0))
  ablsimpg1gend(hs2, hs1, (.g ` c0), hs0, (Base ` c0), c0, (0 ` c0), ((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ ¬ hs0 =(0 ` c0)))∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c0)))
  eqid((Base ` c0))
  eqid((0 ` c0))
  eqid((.g ` c0))
  ad2antrr(w0, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ ¬ hs0 =(0 ` c0)), hs1 ∈(Base ` c0), c0 ∈ Abel)
  ad2antrr(w0, (hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ ¬ hs0 =(0 ` c0)), hs1 ∈(Base ` c0), c0 ∈ SimpGrp)
  simplrl(w0, hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), ¬ hs0 =(0 ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c0))
  simplrr(w0, hs0 ∈(Base ` c0), ¬ hs0 =(0 ` c0), hs1 ∈(Base ` c0))
  simpr((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ ¬ hs0 =(0 ` c0))), hs1 ∈(Base ` c0))
  notbid(hs1 = hs0, hs1 =(0 ` c0), hs0 =(0 ` c0))
  eqeq1(hs1, hs0, (0 ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs1.w(¬ hs0 =(0 ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ CycGrp)
  diff.hs0.w(¬ hs1 =(0 ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c((0 ` c0))
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c((.g ` c0))
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c((Base ` c0))
  diff.hs2.c((.g ` c0))
  diff.hs2.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.w((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ ¬ hs0 =(0 ` c0))))
  diff.hs2.c(hs1)
  diff.hs2.w(((w0 ∧(hs0 ∈(Base ` c0)∧ ¬ hs0 =(0 ` c0)))∧ hs1 ∈(Base ` c0)))
}

blocks.name: ablsimpgfindlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ ablsimpgfind . An element of an abelian finite simple group which doesn't square to the identity has finite order. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablsimpgfindlem1(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2)), wne(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), nat0))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(cbs, c4))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(c0g, c4))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmg, c4))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cod, c4))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, cabl))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c4, csimpg))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2)), wne(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), nat0)), diffsc(s0, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2)), wne(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), nat0)), diffsc(s0, c2))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wne(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2)), wne(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), nat0)), diffsw(s0, w0))
  3expa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wne(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), nat0))
  rexlimddvcbv(hs1, hs0, cz, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2)), wne(cfv(c3, cv(s0)), nat0), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs1), c1, co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)))), wceq(cv(s0), co(cv(hs0), c1, co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)))))
  ablsimpg1gend(hs1, cv(s0), c1, co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c0, c4, c2, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2)))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(c4, cabl))
  3ad2ant1(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2), wcel(c4, csimpg))
  mulgcld(nat2, c1, cv(s0), c0, c4, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2)))
  a1i(w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2)), wcel(nat2, cz))
  neneqd(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2, w3a(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2)))
  simp3(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2))
  simp2(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(co(nat2, c1, cv(s0)), c2))

blocks.content: Lemma for ~ ablsimpgfind . An element of an abelian finite simple group which squares to the identity has finite order. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)

  nsgsubg(hs0, c0)
  mpjaodan((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(SubGrp ` c0)), (hs0 = {(0 ` c0)} ∨ hs0 = c1), (# ` hs0)=(# ` c1), (# ` hs0)= 1)
  olcd(((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(SubGrp ` c0))∧(# ` hs0)=(# ` c1)), hs0 = {(0 ` c0)}, hs0 = c1)
  phphash2d(hs0, c1, ((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(SubGrp ` c0))∧(# ` hs0)=(# ` c1)))

  mpbid((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(SubGrp ` c0)), ((# ` hs0)=(# ` c1)∨(# ` hs0)= 1), (# ` hs0)[||](# ` c1))
  ancoms(w0, hs0 ∈(SubGrp ` c0), (# ` hs0)[||](# ` c1))
  sylan2(hs0 ∈(SubGrp ` c0), w0, (# ` hs0)[||](# ` c1), c1 ∈ Fin)
  lagsubg(hs0, c0, c1)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(SubGrp ` c0)), ((# ` hs0)[||](# ` c1)↔((# ` hs0)=(# ` c1)∨(# ` hs0)= 1)), (# ` c1)∈ Prime, (# ` hs0)∈ ℕ)
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(SubGrp ` c0), (# ` c1)∈ Prime)
  sylanbrc((w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(SubGrp ` c0)), (# ` hs0)∈ ℕ, (# ` hs0)∈ ℕ0, (# ` hs0)≠ 0)

  ssfid(hs0, c1, (w0 ∧ hs0 ∈(SubGrp ` c0)))
  adantr(w0, hs0 ∈(SubGrp ` c0), c1 ∈ Fin)
  mpi(w0, c1 ∈ Fin, (# ` c1)=(# ` c1))
  eqid((# ` c1))
  syl2anc(w0, ((# ` c1)=(# ` c1)→ c1 ∈ Fin), c1 ∈ 𝕌, (# ` c1)∈ ℕ0)
  a1i(w0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)

  ⊢ (w0 →(# ` c0)∈ Prime)
  ⊣ c0 =(Base ` c1)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ Abel)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ SimpGrp)
} = {
  sylanbrc(w0, (# ` c0)∈ Prime, (# ` c0)∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), ∀(hs0 ∈ ℕ,(hs0[||](# ` c0)→(hs0 = 1 ∨ hs0 =(# ` c0)))))
  mpd(w0, (# ` c0)∈(ℤ≥ ` 2), ¬(# ` c0)= 1)
  pm2.65da(w0, (# ` c0)= 1, c0 = {(0 ` c1)})
  hash1elsn(c0, (0 ` c1), cfn, (w0 ∧(# ` c0)= 1))
  simpr(w0, (# ` c0)= 1)
  adantr(w0, (# ` c0)= 1, (0 ` c1)∈ c0)
  syl(w0, (0 ` c1)∈ c0, c1 ∈ Grp)
  grpidcl(c1, (0 ` c1), c0)
  adantr(w0, (# ` c0)= 1, c0 ∈ Fin)
  simpgntrivd(c0, (0 ` c1), c1, (w0 ∧(# ` c0)= 1))
  adantr(w0, (# ` c0)= 1, c1 ∈ SimpGrp)

blocks.name: ablsimpgd
blocks.content: An abelian group is simple if and only if its order is prime. (Contributed by Rohan Ridenour, 3-Aug-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm ablsimpgd(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wcel(c0, csimpg), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cprime)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, cabl))
} = {
  impbida(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg), wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cprime))
  ablsimpgprmd(c1, c0, wa(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg), wcel(c0, cabl))
  simpr(w0, wcel(c0, csimpg))
  prmgrpsimpgd(c0, c1, wa(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cprime)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cprime), wcel(c0, cgrp))
  ablgrpd(c0, w0)
  simpr(w0, wcel(cfv(chash, c1), cprime))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ablsimpgd(class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∈ SimpGrp ↔(# ` c1)∈ Prime))
  ⊣ c1 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ Abel)
} = {
  impbida(w0, c0 ∈ SimpGrp, (# ` c1)∈ Prime)
  ablsimpgprmd(c1, c0, (w0 ∧ c0 ∈ SimpGrp))
  adantr(w0, c0 ∈ SimpGrp, c0 ∈ Abel)
  simpr(w0, c0 ∈ SimpGrp)
  prmgrpsimpgd(c0, c1, (w0 ∧(# ` c1)∈ Prime))
  adantr(w0, (# ` c1)∈ Prime, c0 ∈ Grp)
  ablgrpd(c0, w0)
  simpr(w0, (# ` c1)∈ Prime)
}
